ComicInfo.Title: Old Friends
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Doctor confronts her childhood hero - a roguish Time Lord who isn't all they seem! Eisner-nominated writer Jody Houser (Mother Panic, Stranger Things, Star Wars, Faith, Spider-Man: Renew Your Vows) continues the third arc of the official Doctor Who comic - fast-paced, fun new sci-fi stories, perfect for fans and newcomers alike!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Hannah Templer | 1 | B | Cover B | Photo | 2 | C | Cover C | Giorgia Sposito & Arianna Florean | 3 |
